name: High Sierra Pilots
about: High Sierra Pilots is a full-service flying club and aviation resource center located at the Minden-Tahoe Airport (KMEV) in Nevada. Founded by Bryan Stewart, the club is dedicated to providing affordable access to a diverse range of aircraft, from single-engine trainers to high-performance twin-engine planes. Our passion for General Aviation and safe professional flying sets us apart. We welcome both aspiring pilots and seasoned aviators, offering lessons, discovery flights, and opportunities for cross-country, backcountry, and aerobatic flying. Our community is built on camaraderie, with social events and ongoing training programs to ensure safety and skill development. Join us to enrich your passion for aviation and take your flying skills to the next level.
